include.description: Loads and executes a JS-Eden script file

parameters.object: A number or list to be converted

str.description: Converts a number or list to a string

int.description: Converts a string to an integer

time.description: Get current time in seconds since 1/1/1970

writeln.description: Prints a string to the browser console

execute.description: Evaluates a string as an Eden script

rand.description: Generates a random integer between 0 and 32767

Text.description: Creates a text element for display on the canvas

parameters.colour: Colour of the line in HTML form

Line.description: Creates a line element for display on the canvas

parameters.colour: Colour of the rectangle (fill) in HTML form

Rectangle.description: Creates a rectangle element for display on the canvas

parameters.[points]: List of coordinates in the form [ x1,y1 , x2,y2 ] from the top left corner
parameters.colour: Colour of the polygon (fill) in HTML form

Polygon.description: Creates a polygon element for display on the canvas

parameters.fillcolour: Fill colour for the circle in HTML form
parameters.outlinecolour: Outline colour of the circle in HTML form

Circle.description: Creates a circle element for display on the canvas

Button.description: Creates a button element for display on the canvas

parameters.name: for [name]_clicked
parameters.options: A list of strings providing the options

Combobox.description: Creates a drop-down select box for the canvas

parameters.name: for [name]_value
parameters.orientation: Orientation of the slider, either "vertical" or "horizontal"

Slider.description: Creates a Slider object for the canvas

parameters.[points]: List of coordinates in the form [ x1,y1 , x2,y2 ] from the top left corner

centre.return: List of coordinate [x,y] from the top left corner
centre.description: Finds the centre of a list of points

parameters.[points]: List of coordinates in the form [ x1,y1 , x2,y2 ] from the top left corner
parameters.[vector]: List [x,y] to translate list of points by

translate.return: List of coordinates in the form [ x1,y1 , x2,y2 ] from the top left corner
translate.description: Translates a list of points by a vector

parameters.[points]: List of coordinates in the form [ x1,y1 , x2,y2 ] from the top left corner
parameters.[point]: Point about which to rotate in the form [x,y]
parameters.degrees: Number of degrees to rotate clockwise

rotate.return: List of points of the form [ x1,y1 , x2,y2 ] from the top left corner
rotate.description: Rotates a list of points about a point
